argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hlress.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | hlress.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | #P_hlcph | |- ( W e. CHil -> W e. CPreHil ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_cphsubrg | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CHil -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_cphsca | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CHil -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cphlvec | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. LVec ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_lvecdrng | |- ( W e. LVec -> F e. DivRing ) |
| 10 | 3, 8, 9 | #P_3syl | |- ( W e. CHil -> F e. DivRing ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( W e. CHil -> ( CCfld |`s K ) e. DivRing ) |
| 12 |  | #P_hlbn | |- ( W e. CHil -> W e. Ban ) |
| 13 | 1 | #P_bnsca | |- ( W e. Ban -> F e. CMetSp ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CHil -> F e. CMetSp ) |
| 15 | 7, 14 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( W e. CHil -> ( CCfld |`s K ) e. CMetSp ) |
| 16 | 5, 11, 15 | #P_3jca | |- ( W e. CHil -> ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) /\ ( CCfld |`s K ) e. DivRing /\ ( CCfld |`s K ) e. CMetSp ) ) |
